```{r}
source("libraries.R")
```

```{r}
#Loading the thing

library(openxlsx)


df<-openxlsx::read.xlsx(xlsxFile  = "C:/Users/zlacovino/Documents/datasets/Columbus Corridor RFI Property Details KS 7-11-22.xlsx", sheet = 1)%>%
  filter(Cluster %in% c("Cluster 2","Cluster 3", "Cluster 4", "Cluster 5"))%>%
  mutate(Zip = paste0("0",Zip),
         Full_Address = paste(Address, City, Zip))


df_geoc<-df%>%geocode(Full_Address, method = "census")

cc_map<-st_as_sf(df_geoc, coords = c("long", "lat"), crs = lat_lon_CRS)

ggplot(cc_map)+
  geom_sf(aes(color = Cluster))

```
